meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of artifacts.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various artifactual objects from ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist studied the artifactual remains found at the dig site.
meanings.sent3: The artifactual pottery was so delicate, it seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a treasure trove of artifactual decorations, each with a story to tell.
meanings.sent5: The artifactual jewelry sparkled under the museum lights, drawing in visitors with its history.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to artifacts or artifactual objects.
meanings.sent1: The artifactual collection in the exhibit showcased the craftsmanship of ancient artisans.
meanings.sent2: The artifactual analysis revealed the age and origin of the discovered items.
meanings.sent3: The artifactual tools seemed to have a mind of their own, moving around the workshop mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: Her artifactual discoveries were like pieces of a puzzle, slowly revealing a forgotten history.
meanings.sent5: The artifactual paintings on the cave walls told stories of long-gone civilizations, frozen in time.
